H0.text: what states do not allow daylight savings time. Arizona

H1.text: what states do not allow daylight savings time. Alaska

H2.text: what states do not allow daylight savings time. Florida

H3.text: what states do not allow daylight savings time. Hawaii

A4.text: Arizona is one of two U.S. states, along with Hawaii, that does not observe Daylight Saving Time

A5.text: along with Hawaii, that does not observe Daylight Saving Time

A6.text: In the United States, Arizona (with the exception of the Navajo Nation), Hawaii, and the five populated territories do not participate in daylight saving time.

A7.text: In the United States, it is observed by all states except Hawaii, Arizona (within the latter, however, the Navajo Nation does observe it), and the U.S. Territories.
